ProductInfo.Features:
GW3016HD: Professional 16 Channel H.264 960H/FD1 DVR with HDMI & VGA. FD1/CIF/960H/Q960H recording, 16ch 960H Full Channels Real-time Playback. iPhone, Android Viewing, PTZ Control
GW30WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Outdoor/Indoor Camera. 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm lens, 42pcs IR LED, 115 ft. IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof
GW115H: Professional 1/3" SONY EXview HAD CCD II Vandal proof IR Dome Indoor Camera, 700 TV lines, 36 LEDs, 98.4 feet IR Distance, Vari-Focal 2.8~12mm Manual Zoom Lens. WDR (Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. 0.001 Lux
Package Includes: GW3016HD DVR with 8TB HD; GWLED19IN - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor; 8 x GW30WD - 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II Outdoor Camera; 8 x GW115H - 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II Indoor Camera
1 x GW500RG59: 500 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable; GW1218-10A: 1 x 18 ports power box; 16 x Power pigtail (GW082); 16 x Power pigtail (GW132); 32 x GW10009: Twist On BNC Male Connector
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 16CHE5 Vari-Focal Lens Security Camera Surveillance System (White/Black)
